name: Tenacious Tanks
description:
Tenacious Tanks is a free-to-play, local-multiplayer, fast-based arena brawler, where up to 4 players challenge each other in head-to-head tactical combat!

The action-packed gameplay features bouncing projectiles, various items and deadly traps! The last tank that remains standing is declared the winner!

The project is still under development, the public release is expected to occur in April or May of 2020.
